name: engineernick-vendored
description: Attempt to vendor a few useful extensions into a single extension. Not intended to be published on the marketplace.

configuration.title: Reflow Markdown configuration - Vendored By EngineerNick

reflowMarkdown-ven.preferredLineLength.description: Preferred line length for reflowed lines.

reflowMarkdown-ven.doubleSpaceBetweenSen.description: Insert two spaces instead of one between each sentence.

reflowMarkdown-ven.resizeHeaderDashLines.description: The dashes and equal signs under headers will be re-written to be the same length as the header text.

reflowMarkdown-ven.wrapLongLinks.description: Specifies how links will be wrapped when they in the middle of a line and cause it to extend beyond the preferred length.
enumDescriptions: The link text and the link url are started on the next line, which itself may be longer than the preferrd length.
The link text and the link url are kept on the current line, resulting in it being longer than the preferred length.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
